mapper.sql: requestid, employee, contract_code, contract_add, processcode, agreement_number, processtime,request_type
mapper.select: SELECT qp.requestid, qp.employee, qp.contract_code, qp.contract_add, qp.processcode, qp.agreement_number, qp.processtime,hr.lastname,hr.email,wr.requestnamenew,qp.request_type FROM qd_inface_payment qp LEFT JOIN HrmResource hr ON qp.employee = hr.id LEFT JOIN workflow_requestbase wr ON qp.requestid = wr.requestid WHERE qp.processcode = 0 OR qp.processcode IS NULL
mapper.insert: insert into qd_inface_payment (requestid, employee, contract_code, contract_add, processcode, agreement_number, processtime) values (#{requestid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{employee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processcode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{agreementNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processtime,jdbcType=DATE})

insert into qd_inface_payment
requestid,
employee,
contract_code,
contract_add,
processcode,
agreement_number,
processtime,

mapper.update:
update qd_inface_payment
employee = #{employee,jdbcType=INTEGER},
contract_code = #{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contract_add = #{contractAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
processcode = #{processcode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
agreement_number = #{agreementNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
processtime = #{processtime,jdbcType=DATE},
where requestid = #{requestid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update qd_inface_payment set employee = #{employee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contract_code = #{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_add = #{contractAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, processcode = #{processcode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, agreement_number = #{agreementNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, processtime = #{processtime,jdbcType=DATE} where requestid = #{requestid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
